bike.description: FSR technology, A1 Premium Aluminum TransForm Monocoque, ISCG BB tabs, asymmetrical 6mm offset rear triangle, 4-position adj. travel/head angle DH link, 3-position spring rate progression adjustable, sealed cartridge bearings, replaceable derailleur hanger, 8.1 or 6.8" travel

components.description: Fox Vanilla RC, external rebound and compression adjust, coil spring, stainless steel pin, 8.75" x 2.75"
Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Disc specific routing, derailleur hanger, owners manual, chain stay/seat stay protector
